extension.summary: AIOStreams addon for Kodi with advanced features
extension.description: Search and stream content from AIOStreams with comprehensive Trakt integration, stream quality filtering, reliability tracking, UI enhancements (color coding, progress bars), content discovery, keyboard shortcuts, and maintenance tools. Features dynamic context menus, smart stream sorting, and preference learning.
extension.news: v3.5.8: Use Kodi's arial.ttf (DejaVu Sans) for guaranteed BMP Unicode support. Reduce stream container height by 25%. | v3.5.7: Use Kodi built-in fonts.

extension.summary: Noto Emoji font for emoji rendering in Kodi addons
extension.description:
Google's Noto Emoji font provides comprehensive emoji character support. This resource addon makes the font available to other Kodi addons for emoji rendering in custom skins and dialogs.
Font version: 2.047 License: SIL Open Font License 1.1
Original source: https://github.com/googlefonts/noto-emoji
